refnamediv.refpurpose: converts one or more files to another format

listitem.para: Defines the output format to use. (See below for a list of possible formats)
Defines the level of customization of the file IO.
Lists the options of customization of the given file format.
Use a Java properties file to define the file IO option values.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cdk-fileconvert reads a input file and converts it to a new file with an other format. Supported input formats are CML, MDL Molfile, PDB, PMP, SHELX and XYZ. The input format is automatically detected.
Supported output formats are: cml, gin, mol, pdb, shelx, smi, svg and xyz.
